text: Konovalenko Sports Palace is an indoor sporting arena located in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. The capacity of the arena is 4,300 and opened in 1967. It was the home arena of the Torpedo Nizhny Novgorod ice hockey team of the Russian Super League until the Trade Union Sport Palace opened in 2007. ==External links== *Venue information Category:Indoor ice hockey venues in Russia Category:Indoor arenas in Russia Category:Torpedo Nizhny Novgorod
title: Konovalenko Sports Palace
